text:
@RogerHelmerMEP Sadly for you and Boris, I have a PM who provides exactly what Kipling was talking about - including being cool during an on air interview while there was an earthquake.

The UK would have had 285 Covid19 deaths on a per capita basis compared to NZ based on our approach
